events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The reported case has been categorized under Refund due to customer's request for money back.
Your concern has been assigned to a customer service representative who will handle your refund request.
Hello! I'm here to assist you with your refund request and make sure the process goes smoothly.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the incorrect item you received to process your refund?
Sure, my order number is 1234567890 and I have attached a clear photo showing the wrong product delivered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate the refund immediately and you should see the amount back in your account within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and help. I'm relieved this will be sorted out soon.
The refund process is now complete. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and everything is satisfactory on your side.
As the refund has been received and confirmed, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
We have sent you a short survey to rate your experience with our refund process. Your feedback is appreciated.
